programme.desc: 燕趕出門忘記帶外套，燕父匆忙拿衣服到美容院給她。燕之拍檔Ruby外出用膳未返，燕父遂應承幫她看舖，使她能與蕭小姐午膳。燕父匆忙之際倒瀉了名牌防縐水，惟有加菜賠罪，燕大感事有蹺蹊。燕因少帶了一枝潤膚露，被舅母稱為「大頭蝦」，並揭發小時發高燒，父親卻沒把她及時送入院一事，燕向丈夫申訴。父親遂向燕致歉，燕以為父為其廷誤就醫一事內疚，遂原諒之。燕被美容經紀騙買了二千元水貨，回家大吵大鬧，終發父親曾為自己發高燒而四出籌醫藥費，幸而沒有「燒壞腦」。燕自知錯怪父親，遂帶同點心往找他。.(n)

programme.title: 都市方程式 #40 [粵]
programme.desc: 大殷生與任經理於員工洗手間發現牆上寫著「雞尾祥」，遂心感疑惑。細殷生攜小食偷往員工用作「蛇王」之「Happy房」，與眾人談笑風生。大殷生從細殷生口中吐取員工「屈蛇」之證據，並掃蕩「蛇穴」，向各人嚴厲訓示及扣減薪金作懲罰。眾機房員工均鎖定細殷生為「二五仔」線人，遂放「流料」欲整蠱他一頓。大殷生「行動」失敗後，不但把細殷生狠狠責罵，更著他辭退倫和發。倫和發欲以「跳槽」之謠傳挽回工職，惜細殷生堅稱絕口，只幫他們送辭職信，二人急往辦公室追問之。.(n)

programme.title: 西遊記 (大結局) #30 [粵]
programme.desc: (大結局)皇上囚八戒與沙僧，飛虎以嬰孩要脅與唐僧成婚，唐僧受情愛所困，觀音告知他四嬰孩非其四師徒所生。唐僧與飛虎上演一幕轉世輪廻的活劇，飛虎終被點化！唐僧欣然接過飛虎佩劍，將劍一揮，飛虎一縷青絲立斷。.(n)

programme.title: 都市方程式 #40 [粵]
programme.desc: 大殷生與任經理於員工洗手間發現牆上寫著「雞尾祥」，遂心感疑惑。細殷生攜小食偷往員工用作「蛇王」之「Happy房」，與眾人談笑風生。大殷生從細殷生口中吐取員工「屈蛇」之證據，並掃蕩「蛇穴」，向各人嚴厲訓示及扣減薪金作懲罰。眾機房員工均鎖定細殷生為「二五仔」線人，遂放「流料」欲整蠱他一頓。大殷生「行動」失敗後，不但把細殷生狠狠責罵，更著他辭退倫和發。倫和發欲以「跳槽」之謠傳挽回工職，惜細殷生堅稱絕口，只幫他們送辭職信，二人急往辦公室追問之。.(n)

programme.title: 西遊記(貳) #1 [粵]
programme.desc: 悟空玉身被眾馬騮發現，元神回體後立即喝走眾馬騮。其中一小猴卻纏住要他教法術，而這小猴前身原為六耳彌候，生性聰明百厭，因搗亂天庭被貶落凡間。小六耳鍥而不拾尾隨唐僧，悟空唯有收留它。八仙送來各式法寶給唐僧傍身。唐僧在照妖鏡中發現小六耳真身，正是夢境中遇見的黑白長尾巨猴，於是沙僧、八戒加害六耳令它驚惶逃走。六耳被悟空以前的師父須菩提祖師所救，並收為徒弟。.(n)

programme.title: 古靈精探 #6 [粵]
programme.desc: 酒店的火警鐘突然響起，晴、海慌忙逃生，晴成功不讓朗遇見父親。琪在訪問重案組期間，被雜誌拍下與雋的親密照，但晶卻表示對他信任。費格遜決定調查多年前陳強被殺一案，晶認為放高利貸的九叔最有可疑，但朗卻覺另有內情，兩人更以真相打賭。晴再次約會海，朗欲跟蹤卻被晶破壞，朗只好託義代行。義接受朗的委託，發現他的家姐就是晴，內心高興極了。義調查後終發現晴與海的關係，但卻答應替晴保守秘密。朗偕義到強妻子何麗金住處查問線索，突發現海帶生日蛋糕為強的兒子陳傑慶祝，朗一怒離去。.(n)

programme.title: 都市方程式 #41 [粵]
programme.desc: 楊家打算到戲院睇戲，父正諸多藉口，多番哀求後才勉強出席。晚膳時，侍應欲推介著名小菜，父再次滿口「慳錢理論」，各人只好依從。培夜裡肚餓找食物，被輝看見，培乘機投訴正之行為。正與同事得知當紅歌星王小鶯將開演唱會，眾人緊張撲飛，正相信家人定必會當「觀音兵」，遂回家借故試探家人。娛樂公司郭生乃培之酒樓熟客，培問起拿演唱會飛之事，郭生支吾以對。回家後，正憤然得知沒有預自己一份。培急追問郭生門票之下落，郭生輕然表示忘記了。眾人只好屈在家中看電視，但此時正卻一臉風騷打扮步出房門。.(n)

programme.title: 都市方程式 #42 [粵]
programme.desc: 宏提出辦「奇異果節」，大殷生提議改為「榴槤節」，大殷生最終仍選用宏之意見。大殷生於廁所聽到閒話，遂防範宏。殷太吩咐大殷生以太監李連英造型出席婦女界化妝晚會，更著他答謝宏幫忙籌備。大殷生請堪輿學家司徒先生幫公司睇風水，喜獲批富貴命，時宏路過，師傅提到宏之成就不比大殷生低，令大殷生不是味兒。三人午膳時，大殷生面如黑鑊，更刻意點選難吃的苦瓜作為菜式。大殷生不斷針對宏，並堅持舉辦「雞尾食品節」，終令生意拍檔周生退出計劃，宏有意辭退，時酒店之生意拍檔鄧生卻改寫了他的決定。.(n)

programme.title: 古靈精探 #6 [粵]

programme.title: 都市方程式 #41 [粵]
programme.desc: 楊家打算到戲院睇戲，父正諸多藉口，多番哀求後才勉強出席。晚膳時，侍應欲推介著名小菜，父再次滿口「慳錢理論」，各人只好依從。培夜裡肚餓找食物，被輝看見，培乘機投訴正之行為。正與同事得知當紅歌星王小鶯將開演唱會，眾人緊張撲飛，正相信家人定必會當「觀音兵」，遂回家借故試探家人。娛樂公司郭生乃培之酒樓熟客，培問起拿演唱會飛之事，郭生支吾以對。回家後，正憤然得知沒有預自己一份。培急追問郭生門票之下落，郭生輕然表示忘記了。眾人只好屈在家中看電視，但此時正卻一臉風騷打扮步出房門。.(n)

programme.title: 都市方程式 #42 [粵]
programme.desc: 宏提出辦「奇異果節」，大殷生提議改為「榴槤節」，大殷生最終仍選用宏之意見。大殷生於廁所聽到閒話，遂防範宏。殷太吩咐大殷生以太監李連英造型出席婦女界化妝晚會，更著他答謝宏幫忙籌備。大殷生請堪輿學家司徒先生幫公司睇風水，喜獲批富貴命，時宏路過，師傅提到宏之成就不比大殷生低，令大殷生不是味兒。三人午膳時，大殷生面如黑鑊，更刻意點選難吃的苦瓜作為菜式。大殷生不斷針對宏，並堅持舉辦「雞尾食品節」，終令生意拍檔周生退出計劃，宏有意辭退，時酒店之生意拍檔鄧生卻改寫了他的決定。.(n)

programme.title: 西遊記(貳) #1 [粵]
programme.desc: 悟空玉身被眾馬騮發現，元神回體後立即喝走眾馬騮。其中一小猴卻纏住要他教法術，而這小猴前身原為六耳彌候，生性聰明百厭，因搗亂天庭被貶落凡間。小六耳鍥而不拾尾隨唐僧，悟空唯有收留它。八仙送來各式法寶給唐僧傍身。唐僧在照妖鏡中發現小六耳真身，正是夢境中遇見的黑白長尾巨猴，於是沙僧、八戒加害六耳令它驚惶逃走。六耳被悟空以前的師父須菩提祖師所救，並收為徒弟。.(n)

programme.desc: 宏提出辦「奇異果節」，大殷生提議改為「榴槤節」，大殷生最終仍選用宏之意見。大殷生於廁所聽到閒話，遂防範宏。殷太吩咐大殷生以太監李連英造型出席婦女界化妝晚會，更著他答謝宏幫忙籌備。大殷生請堪輿學家司徒先生幫公司睇風水，喜獲批富貴命，時宏路過，師傅提到宏之成就不比大殷生低，令大殷生不是味兒。三人午膳時，大殷生面如黑鑊，更刻意點選難吃的苦瓜作為菜式。大殷生不斷針對宏，並堅持舉辦「雞尾食品節」，終令生意拍檔周生退出計劃，宏有意辭退，時酒店之生意拍檔鄧生卻改寫了他的決定。.(n)

programme.title: 西遊記(貳) #2 [粵]
programme.desc: 小六耳跟隨須菩提，並常常夢見自己變成大猩猩踩死唐僧，在憂慮之下決定放棄學法術，以免夢境成真。在高昌國，唐僧師徒與三獸精決鬥，三個回合中八戒輸了第一個回合，幸悟空在第二、三回合中以法術贏了眾獸精。獸精惱羞成怒，竟與悟空大打出手，終被悟空趕離高昌國，令高昌國百姓終可享受安樂日子。須菩提奉玉帝之命離開三星洞接任涇河龍王，然而小六耳則決定跟隨小鵬女投奔大鵬精。.(n)

programme.title: 古靈精探 #7 [粵]
programme.desc: 朗誤會海因包二奶而拋妻棄子，但海向晴說出強與他是好友，發現金母子生活拮据而接濟她們。朗欲放棄調查強一案，義主動說出海只是接濟她們。朗拾獲鳳的證物時產生通靈感應，看見有一玫瑰紋身。朗從證人口中得悉有重要人物「大飛」失蹤多年，晶查出原來強的擔保人「大飛」正是海。晶與義卻不敢將實情告之朗。美向晴提議向朗說出已認回海，但晴卻怕弄巧反拙，朗終於發現真相，與晴爭執時，更在舊照片中發現海與強的合照，看到海身上的紋身。晶與義找海問話時，朗出現更出言要拘捕海控告他謀殺。.(n)

programme.title: 都市方程式 #43 [粵]
programme.desc: 楊家得悉澳門四姨婆將到其家暫住，有自稱十一姑的老人按鐘至，更提到只會打擾一星期，便移民往美國去。燕媽吩咐兒子輝讓出房子，時輝赫發現房子異常混亂惡臭。「眼蒙耳聾」的十一姑獨自外出晨運，各人擔心她久未回家，時十一姑回來，並訓示眾人。燕媽及輝阻止十一姑去晨運，突然她感到耳痛，輝遂帶她看醫生，被醫生責怪，輝不服要付七百元之醫藥費。 細殷生邀十一姑與父聚舊，燕父等人頓感如釋重負。十一姑甫見大殷生，便稱他「癩喱頭」，惟大殷生沒有印象。十一姑順利移民，眾人鬆一口氣，惟輝卻擺出一臉愁容。.(n)

programme.title: 都市方程式 #44 [粵]
programme.desc: 芬路過源之課室，被同學認出她曾留案底，眾人議論紛紛，限源兩星期內查證此事，他爽快地以牙齒作賭注，並認定芬沒有紋身，否則甘願替各人「挽鞋」。源出盡法寶仍未能接近惠芬，欲寫信邀約她外出，時芬答應與源去游泳。二人到達海灘，芬向源細訴心事。源與同學正研究惠芬有否紋身，被惠芬聽到，她一怒而去，源連忙向她解釋，芬原諒之。芬之舊男友強找源晦氣，芬阻止，強一怒之下撕破她的衣服便離去。.(n)

programme.desc: 小六耳跟隨須菩提，並常常夢見自己變成大猩猩踩死唐僧，在憂慮之下決定放棄學法術，以免夢境成真。在高昌國，唐僧師徒與三獸精決鬥，三個回合中八戒輸了第一個回合，幸悟空在第二、三回合中以法術贏了眾獸精。獸精惱羞成怒，竟與悟空大打出手，終被悟空趕離高昌國，令高昌國百姓終可享受安樂日子。須菩提奉玉帝之命離開三星洞接任涇河龍王，然而小六耳則決定跟隨小鵬女投奔大鵬精。.(n)

programme.title: 古靈精探 #7 [粵]
programme.desc: 朗誤會海因包二奶而拋妻棄子，但海向晴說出強與他是好友，發現金母子生活拮据而接濟她們。朗欲放棄調查強一案，義主動說出海只是接濟她們。朗拾獲鳳的證物時產生通靈感應，看見有一玫瑰紋身。朗從證人口中得悉有重要人物「大飛」失蹤多年，晶查出原來強的擔保人「大飛」正是海。晶與義卻不敢將實情告之朗。美向晴提議向朗說出已認回海，但晴卻怕弄巧反拙，朗終於發現真相，與晴爭執時，更在舊照片中發現海與強的合照，看到海身上的紋身。晶與義找海問話時，朗出現更出言要拘捕海控告他謀殺。.(n)

programme.title: 都市方程式 #43 [粵]
programme.desc: 楊家得悉澳門四姨婆將到其家暫住，有自稱十一姑的老人按鐘至，更提到只會打擾一星期，便移民往美國去。燕媽吩咐兒子輝讓出房子，時輝赫發現房子異常混亂惡臭。「眼蒙耳聾」的十一姑獨自外出晨運，各人擔心她久未回家，時十一姑回來，並訓示眾人。燕媽及輝阻止十一姑去晨運，突然她感到耳痛，輝遂帶她看醫生，被醫生責怪，輝不服要付七百元之醫藥費。 細殷生邀十一姑與父聚舊，燕父等人頓感如釋重負。十一姑甫見大殷生，便稱他「癩喱頭」，惟大殷生沒有印象。十一姑順利移民，眾人鬆一口氣，惟輝卻擺出一臉愁容。.(n)

programme.title: 都市方程式 #44 [粵]
programme.desc: 芬路過源之課室，被同學認出她曾留案底，眾人議論紛紛，限源兩星期內查證此事，他爽快地以牙齒作賭注，並認定芬沒有紋身，否則甘願替各人「挽鞋」。源出盡法寶仍未能接近惠芬，欲寫信邀約她外出，時芬答應與源去游泳。二人到達海灘，芬向源細訴心事。源與同學正研究惠芬有否紋身，被惠芬聽到，她一怒而去，源連忙向她解釋，芬原諒之。芬之舊男友強找源晦氣，芬阻止，強一怒之下撕破她的衣服便離去。.(n)

programme.title: 西遊記(貳) #2 [粵]
programme.desc: 小六耳跟隨須菩提，並常常夢見自己變成大猩猩踩死唐僧，在憂慮之下決定放棄學法術，以免夢境成真。在高昌國，唐僧師徒與三獸精決鬥，三個回合中八戒輸了第一個回合，幸悟空在第二、三回合中以法術贏了眾獸精。獸精惱羞成怒，竟與悟空大打出手，終被悟空趕離高昌國，令高昌國百姓終可享受安樂日子。須菩提奉玉帝之命離開三星洞接任涇河龍王，然而小六耳則決定跟隨小鵬女投奔大鵬精。.(n)

programme.title: 科學催化劑 17
programme.desc: At Catalyst we know that scientific discovery and the use of scientific knowledge is a dynamic force that can inspire and activate us. With our exciting mix of science genres, viewers are exposed to extraordinary topics, empowering us all to improve our lives through a better understanding of how science shapes our world.(n)

programme.title: 流言終結者 8
programme.desc: Mythbusters takes myths, tall tales and urban legends and gives them the scientific treatment to determine their validity. Myths are proved true, probable, possible, improbable or busted. Often after the real-world practical tests have proved or debunked a Myth, the team will take the experiment to the extreme, many times using more modern technology than the myth could have used or upping the black powder for impressive explosions.(n)

programme.title: 自己動手做
programme.desc: How to Build Everything breaks down the step-by-step process behind our world's greatest innovations in a way everyone can understand. From the helicopter to the hovercraft and from the cruise ship to the satellite, each episode will take you on a fun, fascinating, tongue-in-cheek adventure through our most incredible machines.(n)

programme.title: The Late Late Show with James Corden
食落肚，是咁造 - 美國篇
自己動手做
programme.desc: How to Build Everything breaks down the step-by-step process behind our world's greatest innovations in a way everyone can understand. From the helicopter to the hovercraft and from the cruise ship to the satellite, each episode will take you on a fun, fascinating, tongue-in-cheek adventure through our most incredible machines.(n)

programme.title: 食落肚，是咁造 - 美國篇
食落肚，是咁造 - 美國篇
The Late Late Show with James Corden
智富通
programme.desc: 「智富通」為ViuTV全方位理財節目，為觀眾帶來港股、環球金融市場、衍生工具、理財產品、金融科技、本地及海外樓市、企業專訪、創業、親子理財及名人專訪等精彩內容。智富有道、融通天下，為觀眾打造一個全方位理財資訊平台。.(n)

programme.title: 偉大的誘惑者
programme.desc: 上流階層青年男女之間，以整個人生作為賭注的浪漫誘惑愛情遊戲。.(n)

programme.title: 健康日記
programme.desc: 人體原來很容易會脫水，而隨踏著年齡的增加，人對口渴的敏感度亦會大大降低，\r\n所以專家會教你新方法，令你好好留意，定時補水！.(n)

programme.title: 見習神仙精靈 3
programme.desc: 小學五年級的心，是個有些笨拙但很善良的女孩子。“所有物品裡都有靈魂”她遵守著奶奶的這番教誨，對物品非常愛惜。某天，心非常珍愛的彩色鉛筆誕生了神明。這些神明有著決不能被人發現的規矩，但卻被心看到了！以被發現為契機，兩人結下了“秘密的契約”.(n)

programme.title: 雷頓 不可思議偵探社 ～卡特莉的解謎事件簿～
programme.desc: 雷頓神秘偵探社～卡托莉的解謎檔案～動畫全集講述雷頓的女兒卡托莉艾露與會說話的狗夏洛、助手諾亞一起經營雷頓偵探社，解決發生在倫敦的各種不可思議的事件。雖然這份工作最初的目的是尋找父親的下落，但由於異想天開的思考解開了各種謎題成為話題，各種各樣的委託也隨之而來。.(n)

programme.title: 快樂童盟 - 魔術宅急便
今日疫情
programme.desc: 武漢肺炎持續擴散，疫情已成為每日市民最關心的話題。面對疫情來勢洶洶，大眾迫切需要知道如何有效對抗武漢疫症。Viu TV因此製作《今日疫情》節目，每晚以直播形式進行，報道每日關乎疫情的最新情況，並邀請有關的專家嘉賓提供意見共抗疫情。內容都以貼近民生為大前題。.(n)

programme.title: 齊齊走飲管
programme.desc: 我們買飲品時可以「走甜」甚至「走冰」，但是很多時也不會想「走飲管」。其實這都是一種習慣，但一個小舉動就可以拯救我們的家 - 地球，以及無數海洋中的生命。你的一小步，環保一大步！.(n)

programme.title: 會讀心術的那小子
programme.desc: 此劇講述在肢體接觸的瞬間就能讀懂對方秘密的少年和拼命都想隱藏內心傷痕的少女之間的故事。.(n)

programme.title: 晚吹 - 總有一瓣喺左近
今日疫情
programme.desc: 武漢肺炎持續擴散，疫情已成為每日市民最關心的話題。面對疫情來勢洶洶，大眾迫切需要知道如何有效對抗武漢疫症。Viu TV因此製作《今日疫情》節目，每晚以直播形式進行，報道每日關乎疫情的最新情況，並邀請有關的專家嘉賓提供意見共抗疫情。內容都以貼近民生為大前題。.(n)

programme.title: 偵探少女有紗的事件簿
晚吹 - 總有一瓣喺左近
偉大的誘惑者
programme.desc: 上流階層青年男女之間，以整個人生作為賭注的浪漫誘惑愛情遊戲。.(n)

programme.title: 健康日記
programme.desc: 人體原來很容易會脫水，而隨踏著年齡的增加，人對口渴的敏感度亦會大大降低，\r\n所以專家會教你新方法，令你好好留意，定時補水！.(n)

programme.title: 中學預備班
programme.desc: 環境綠化的邁向學習型學校，為學生提供多元化的校本課程，照顧同學的學習多樣性。希望培養學生懂得獨立思考，建立正面人生觀。.(n)

programme.title: 時間飛船 – 惡黨反擊
恐怖醫學
programme.desc: 一些大家很少留意的症狀，可能是某種嚴重疾病的先兆。由該疾病領域的醫師，進行解說及分析，並介紹簡單的自我檢測，對症下藥，分享最適合的治療方法。.(n)

programme.title: Chill Club
programme.desc: 今集《Chill Club》請來資深唱作人吳國敬，除了唱出自己的經典作品外，他更會和羅敏莊Mimi唱出當年膾炙人口的合唱情歌《對你太在乎》。配合主題「吳國敬作品集」，除了Mimi及Thor外，今集更邀請到代班主持強尼，演繹多首吳國敬的創作。.(n)

programme.title: Barter Game價值連城
programme.desc: 『價值』等不等於金錢？6位藝人分成三隊，走到物資不很充裕的茶馬古道、婆羅洲及古巴，透過尋覓具價值的事物、與當地人和事交流，窺探不同地方、不同的人、不同的價值觀。.(n)

programme.title: 變形金剛 斯比頓傳奇
週六好戲勢: 黃飛鴻之英雄有夢
美選 D.n.A
programme.desc: ViuTV首個實況選美節目，尋找獨具「天使」／「魔鬼」基因的美麗女性。20位Ladies進行天才表演淘汰賽和連串特別任務，將女性魅力重新演繹。.(n)

programme.title: 巷弄台北
programme.desc: 台北街道總是展現無比生命力，發展出獨特的巷弄風情。同一條街，三數條巷子，咖啡室、書室、雜貨店、性格小店開滿地，老舊房子不時出沒於巷弄間，讓你慢慢尋寶，仔細回味。.(n)

programme.title: 設計香港
programme.desc: 繼《香港插畫師》系列，延伸至「設計香港」系列。每集以兩位設計師及其作品為主題。採訪香港不同層面、不同風格的設計師，展現香港設計師獨特的眼界與技藝，及他們對香港生活的看法。.(n)

programme.title: 聲畫合拍 2
programme.desc: 第六屆微電影「創+作」支援計劃（音樂篇），雲集一群本地新晉導演，以影像結合不同新晉歌手的音樂，運用微電影手法推廣歌手及其歌曲；憑創意配搭熱誠，製作出風格迥異的聲畫作品。《聲畫合拍S2》將會播放計劃當中的13部優秀作品，並會訪問台前幕後不同崗位的製作團隊，讓觀眾欣賞作品之餘，亦能深入了解團隊們在鏡頭下的拍攝點滴。.(n)

programme.title: 舉高雙手2
programme.desc: 表演藝術向來無實際形式、無地域規限，呢班新生代嘅藝術家正積極尋求唔同方式嘅合作，豐富香港文化界嘅內涵。承接第一輯敢問、敢學、敢玩嘅精神，dR. X會繼續搵嚟一大班音樂、文化同藝術界別嘅新星，進行互動交流。呢班「新文化精英」，目前肩負起「承先啟後」嘅重要任務，佢地除咗獻上精彩嘅表演，引導dR. X同觀眾們認識另類嘅流行文化資訊，更會無私地分享向青少年推廣藝術嘅計劃同經驗，點樣致力去啟發下一代深入接觸文化藝術，擴闊佢地嘅視野同創造力。.(n)

programme.title: 一切從溫泉開始
programme.desc: Michelle 和 Hailey 到石川縣有個大型工藝村，親手學做金箔手工藝及蕎麥麵，細味品嚐地道日本文化。.(n)

programme.title: 虔誠到爆
programme.desc: 原來清真寺無處不在，甚至總有一間在左近！KB今次帶大家走入回教徒的日常生活，進一步了解回教徒在香港的生活！.(n)

programme.title: 暗中旅行
programme.desc: 今集芷媛和Yancy將會有機會進入一個以跨性別人士為主的主題樂園觀賞表演，並且與其中一位表演者進行交談。過程中，他們可以了解到跨性別人士的心路歷程和表演的預備功夫。對於每個少數群體來說，他們最需要的是尊重和接納。.(n)

programme.title: Good Night Show 全民造星
programme.desc: 99位男生接受不同類型歌舞比試，由各媒體代表票選汰弱留強，出綫選手有機會與電影公司及唱片公司合作，最終誕生一位終極偶像，個人奪得100萬港幣獎金，成就造星傳奇。.(n)

programme.title: Good Night Show 全民造星

programme.title: Chill Club

programme.title: 慳D啦 Honey
programme.desc: 四對情侶在同一屋簷下相處十日，240小時全天候接受考驗，在最有限的預算及資源下衝破難關，勝出的一隊可以獨嬴十萬元獎金。最後情侶間是情比金堅，還是贏了奬金輸了感情。.(n)

programme.title: 虔誠到爆
programme.desc: 原來清真寺無處不在，甚至總有一間在左近！KB今次帶大家走入回教徒的日常生活，進一步了解回教徒在香港的生活！.(n)

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: 傳統的中國社會對「家」的觀念很重。可是來到21世紀，這個觀念開始變得薄弱，尤其是年輕新一代。我們如何在家庭裡透過有效的對話建立甜蜜溫馨的氣氛？每集鄭丹瑞(阿旦)將訪問嘉賓，讓觀眾感受到嘉賓溫馨的家庭故事。.(n)

programme.title: 一切從溫泉開始
programme.desc: Michelle 和 Hailey 到石川縣有個大型工藝村，親手學做金箔手工藝及蕎麥麵，細味品嚐地道日本文化。.(n)

programme.title: 快樂童盟 - 初踏台板
6點新聞報道 及 新聞智庫
Girls’ Talk - 愛情開箱
programme.desc: 校園愛情故事總係最Pure最True嘅！中學時暗戀吓師兄有邊個女仔未試過呀！但Ansheles話佢中學時仲未「進化」完成，係宅男一名，無女仔鐘意喎！咁今集嘅愛情補習班，就等娟姐、家媛、Renee、Emily同宅男Anshles分享吓佢地中學時期嘅荳芽夢啦！.(n)

programme.title: 午間新聞 及 經緯人‧物誌
快樂童盟 - 盞鬼教史
6點新聞報道 及 新聞智庫
Girls’ Talk - 呃Like 派出所
programme.desc: 情人節、紀念日、生日、聖誕節，每逢節日都要送禮物，又要創意又要心思，邊度諗到咁多野送呀？今集girls talk 派出所就出去搜尋創意之作，親手整之餘仲貼心為親朋戚友送上最獨有嘅氣味！想知整咩就要睇實我地啦！.(n)

programme.title: 午間新聞 及 都會藍圖
齊齊走飲管
programme.desc: 我們買飲品時可以「走甜」甚至「走冰」，但是很多時也不會想「走飲管」。其實這都是一種習慣，但一個小舉動就可以拯救我們的家 - 地球，以及無數海洋中的生命。你的一小步，環保一大步！.(n)

programme.title: 快樂童盟 - 時尚小教主
6點新聞報道 及 新聞智庫
新紮法官
programme.desc: 林正道在去新審判部上班前的一天答應了媽媽去相親，在那裡他看到了不少名門望族，可性格正直的正道對她們一點興趣也沒有。林正道在地鐵上遇到見義勇為的朴充滿，原來他們是中學同學，而且即將會在同一個地區的民事44部當法官。兩人第一天上班，就遇到怪裡怪氣的的審判長韓部長….(n)

programme.title: 午間新聞 及 示位Show
齊齊走飲管
programme.desc: 我們買飲品時可以「走甜」甚至「走冰」，但是很多時也不會想「走飲管」。其實這都是一種習慣，但一個小舉動就可以拯救我們的家 - 地球，以及無數海洋中的生命。你的一小步，環保一大步！.(n)

programme.title: 雷頓 不可思議偵探社 ～卡特莉的解謎事件簿～
快樂童盟 - 人人有功練
6點新聞報道 及 新聞智庫
晚吹 - 又要威 又要戴頭盔
programme.desc: 喺肥人嘅世界裡面，分別住咗天使與魔鬼 - 帶俾佢哋快樂嘅天使，叫「美食」；帶俾佢哋痛苦嘅魔鬼，叫「營養師」。.(n)

programme.title: 新紮法官
programme.desc: 朴充滿作為法官，終於迎來第一次審判，心情緊張的她，面對大大小小鎖碎的案件仍然用心傾聽，相反韓部長卻對此十分麻木，作為也參與審判其中的林正道，覺得朴充滿太過感情用事。.(n)

programme.title: 晚吹 - 又要威 又要戴頭盔
programme.desc: 喺肥人嘅世界裡面，分別住咗天使與魔鬼 - 帶俾佢哋快樂嘅天使，叫「美食」；帶俾佢哋痛苦嘅魔鬼，叫「營養師」。.(n)

programme.title: Bushi-Meshiii
programme.desc: The second installment of the heart-warming Edo culinary drama is here. Forced to live on his own in Edo, Hanshiro Sakata is entrusted with a secret mission from his lord and begins his life as a spy, kitchen knife in hand! With cuisine as his selling point, Hanshiro heals with his delicious meals.(n)

programme.title: Japan In Motion -100 Tips To Enjoy Life In Japan
programme.desc: An ethnically-diverse group of three friends, all girls, visit every part of Japan to find out how to make living in Japan fun. Coming from different countries, their ways of thinking are different, leading to some clashes.(n)

programme.title: Family Fortune War
programme.desc: Ikuo Sato (Osamu Mukai) is a good-natured medical intern with his single mother's best interests at heart. A quirk of fate leads to his marriage to Kaede Kawamura (Nana Eikura), the daughter of a family that manages a funeral business. However, her family is whipping up a maelstrom of greed.(n)

programme.title: Kawaii JAPAN-da!!
programme.desc: Six models representing Shibuya and Harajuku style show the world the charms of Japan's "kawaii" that is popular now with girls. Check out all of the "kawaii" out there you can meet!(n)

programme.title: Enjoy Japan! - Food, Travel & Culture
programme.desc: Japan has all sorts of delights that can only be enjoyed in certain locales and areas! This programme takes us to such locales throughout the country, experiencing delicious food, beautiful seasonal scenery, traditional festivals and other places you might not know about.(n)

programme.title: Welcome, Migrants!
programme.desc: Makoto is an adventurous individual hoping to become an architectural designer. Together with Aki, a half-hearted sort who hopes to move to Gifu Prefecture, they'll explore four cities to find the perfect old Japanese folk house to open a cafe in.(n)

programme.desc: A town walk variety show where cynical and jaded comedian Ariyoshi and TV broadcaster Yoko Shono stroll around a town without having any definite purpose or plan. Along the way, the pair randomly drop in on various shops in quest of interesting and trivial treasures.(n)

programme.title: Kimi wa Pet
programme.desc: Sumire Iwaya works as a journalist at a major newspaper. She is a career woman with both wit and charm, but she is terrible at relationships. One day, she takes in a young boy who she finds homeless in a cardboard box in front of her home.(n)

programme.title: Tsukai TV Sukatto Japan
programme.desc: This show features reenactments of real-life situations where someone uses cunning and wit to beat the annoying people we struggle with daily. An entertaining, exhilarating stress relief for viewers!(n)

programme.title: What Can You Win With $1,000?
programme.desc: This is an experimental variety show in which members of Kis-My-Ft2 devote themselves wholeheartedly to completing all sorts of tasks with 100,000 yen to see if they pay off.(n)

programme.title: Hanataka!-Tips From Japan's 30%
programme.desc: New life-hacks and upheavals of common knowledge appear every day. In this information age, what sets information apart as more precious? Well, if you know something only 30 per cent of Japanese know, that ought to be something to gloat about!(n)

programme.title: Vs Arashi
programme.desc: This is a variety show in which "Arashi" and a guest or two form a team to compete against a guest team in physical games!(n)

programme.title: Tokoro Japan
programme.desc: With explanations from specialists of various fields, George Tokoro reveals the truth behind mysteries in Japan you might think you understand, but don't. An intellectual variety show that will give you a handle on food, history, geography and other features of Japan through its unique lens!(n)

programme.title: Panda Judges The World
programme.desc: Conjecture and coercion have got nothing to do with it. They expose the gray areas of the modern world. Nana Seino and Ryusei Yokohama become the most sinister pair. A new-age, cynical mystery full of thrills and unpredictable twists!(n)

programme.title: Tsukai TV Sukatto Japan
programme.desc: This show features reenactments of real-life situations where someone uses cunning and wit to beat the annoying people we struggle with daily. An entertaining, exhilarating stress relief for viewers!(n)

programme.title: Enjoy Japan! - Food, Travel & Culture
programme.desc: Japan has all sorts of delights that can only be enjoyed in certain locales and areas! This programme takes us to such locales throughout the country, experiencing delicious food, beautiful seasonal scenery, traditional festivals and other places you might not know about.(n)

programme.title: Magical Countryside Tours In Japan
programme.desc: In this all-inclusive local travel programme, the connections of local TV station staff throughout Japan are used to introduce local secret spots, jam-packed with info you won't find in guide books. This programme is sure to give you the travel bug!(n)

programme.title: Hangin' Around In Hokkaido

programme.title: Good Doctor
programme.desc: Minato Shindo is a young male savant with astounding memory, but has problems communicating. In this moving story of his growth as a doctor, he overcomes troubles and bias against a backdrop of pediatric medicine. His kindness affects child patients, siblings, parents and the hospital as a whole.(n)

programme.title: Absolute Zero
programme.desc: The Pre-Criminal Investigation Unit analyzes big data to predict and prevent crimes. Flushed out in the investigation, Yamauchi (You Yokoyama) and Odagiri (Tsubasa Honda) find a sobbing Izawa (Ikki Sawamura) standing over a gunshot victim, pistol in hand. Has Izawa finally crossed the line?(n)

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: When Tim is celebrated for accidentally inventing a pencil holder, Flint gets jealous and starts to doubt his own skills as an inventor.(n)

programme.title: Wishfart

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: Ant wants to go faster than the fastest fish in the sea, the sailfish, but he hasn't prepared for a deadly oil spill.(n)

programme.title: The Wild Adventures of Blinky Bill
programme.desc: Blinky and Jacko search for gold on a quest to retrieve Blinky's compass from the greedy Mayor Cranklepot.(n)

programme.title: Tashi
programme.desc: A wild Rumpus is set upon the village, and the only one who might help Tashi, Jack and Lotus is a sad genie who has been displaced from his lamp by a grumpy old Lightning Ghost.(n)

programme.title: Sally Bollywood: Super Detective
programme.desc: Doowee works on an archaeological dig and makes new friends. He also finds an ancient urn, the best thing that's ever been unearthed on the dig. Wow!(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Figaro Pho
programme.desc: In fear, Figaro causes the fish bowl to shatter, leaving a piranha gasping for breath. Filled with remorse, Figaro turns on the taps in an attempt to save the fish. But in so doing, he fills his house with water!(n)

programme.title: Project Planet
programme.desc: A robot arrives at one school, keeping the students entertained as it assesses and processes recyclable bottles and cans when they are deposited. Each school also has an individual challenge to support local native wildlife.(n)

programme.title: Ecomaths

programme.title: Biodiversity Under Threat

programme.desc: King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.(n)

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Flint and Sam babysit so they can buy a new board game, but when Brent hires them as his babysitter, they have to decide whether the humiliation is worth the reward.(n)

programme.title: Wishfart
programme.desc: A baby selkie thinks Akiko's his mama, so she wishes it was big enough to take care of itself.(n)

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom
programme.desc: When things start disappearing around Lakebottom, the campers quickly realise McGee's hiccups are the cause. Luckily, Rosebud knows the cure. Unluckily, she vanishes into thin air. Now no one is safe from McGee's hiccups.(n)

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: The Nektons explore Lemuria but Fontaine realises the others are being affected by a dangerous algae. Can she find an antidote and save them?(n)

programme.title: The Wild Adventures of Blinky Bill
programme.desc: A mystical mountain goat arrives in Greenpatch on his pilgrimage for 'The One'. Blinky and Jacko are quickly drawn into his quest.(n)

programme.title: Tashi
programme.sub-title: S01E48 Tashi & the Fish of Destiny
programme.desc: When luck finds Granny White Eyes, Jack and Tashi a fortune-telling fish, it's not so lucky that the Baron overhears it tell them that a great calamity will befall the village. When the fish escapes, the boys chase after it.(n)

programme.title: Sally Bollywood: Super Detective
programme.sub-title: S02E43 Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Sally receives an anonymous note saying the principal will lose his voice. A number of other harmless crimes occur - all with warning letters telling Sally they're about to happen, and Sally has to find out who is the culprit.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Figaro Pho
programme.desc: Figaro realises he's is in danger of being evicted from his own home by his freeloading relative, Ernesto. In desperation, Figaro creates a series of bizarre plans to eject his unwanted relative, causing untold mayhem.(n)

programme.title: Project Planet
programme.desc: Five students with a passion for the environment have been recruited as Waste Warriors, leading a sustainability mission at their Australian schools.(n)

programme.title: What It's Like
programme.desc: A show for young people in our community whose voices, stories and perspectives aren't often seen or heard. In this episode, we hear what it's like to be adopted.(n)

programme.title: How to Do Stuff Good
programme.desc: Make your next sleepover a party. Christian makes mug snacks for dinner and breakfast, Molly makes a giant pizza pull-apart cake, and Hari and Lila serve up the do's and don'ts for your next sleepover.(n)

programme.title: Sally and Possum
programme.desc: Finger spelling is good for showing people words. Possum knows Auslan signs and lots of finger spelling words. Now Possum School is on again and he is learning to write some words in English too.(n)

programme.title: In My Shoes
programme.desc: Yangshuo lies on the Li River. Local farmers access the markets via the river.(n)

programme.title: btn
programme.desc: A high-energy, fun way for upper primary and secondary students to learn about current issues and events in their world. Each program is built around major news stories of the week.(n)

programme.title: The House In Session
programme.desc: The Australian Parliament has two chambers. The House of Representatives, which makes laws and votes on them, and the Senate, whose job it is to check the work of the House of Representatives. Learn more about the Senate.(n)

programme.title: Making Media
programme.desc: We go behind the scenes on the creation of a short film, music video, film trailer and website to cover shooting styles, interview techniques, approaches to editing, and concepts of web design.(n)

programme.title: You Can't Ask That in the Classroom
programme.desc: In this special classroom edition, a diverse mix of African Australians are asked outrageous questions about racism, poverty, and hair. Their answers are anything but black and white.(n)

programme.title: Ethics Matters
programme.desc: Interviewees Tony Coady, Monima Chadha and Bronwyn Finnigan show how we can live in a society with competing moral codes and differing religious views.(n)

programme.title: Legal Briefs
programme.desc: Neil Young QC and Ron Merkel QC were opposite each other in a case about illegal speech. The case used the Racial Discrimination Act, and they discuss this law and freedom of speech.(n)

programme.title: Sally Bollywood: Super Detective
programme.desc: At a school flea market, someone steals a prized comic book and runs off with it. Sally and Doowee chase after the thief, who tosses the comic and gets away.(n)

programme.title: Scream Street
programme.desc: To avoid failing a test Cleo, unleashes plagues over Scream Street. Not realising how bad they were going to be she is now desperate to stop them. Can she enlist the help of Luke and Resus before they ruin the entire town?(n)

programme.title: SheZow
programme.desc: When the SheHicle breaks down SheZow employs a former crook named Master Cylinder to fix it, but he takes it on a joy ride that fills Megadale's villains with envy.(n)

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Ton-Ton's friends, The Dumps, visit the Flatirons but are too wild and crazy for the crew, so the Dinotrux build a racetrack perfect for joyriding.(n)

programme.title: Jamillah and Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin and Jamillah volunteer to look after Razin's shop when he's away, which is fun at first, until they unpack something deadly.(n)

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.desc: Olive and Otto are sent to Shapely Manor to investigate an odd crime with even odder people.(n)

programme.title: Backstage
programme.desc: A new class assignment has Bianca on edge. Vanessa receives a surprise from Beckett. An old friend returns to Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Annedroids
programme.desc: Anne needs Zack and Shania's help with a new android she's created: a dogdroid named Fangs.(n)

programme.title: Horrible Science

programme.title: What's For Dinner?

programme.title: Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch
programme.desc: Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch put their feet to the floor for a high-speed Cornish adventure. Dad Gordon gives Tilly her first driving lesson in a banger racing car.(n)

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Matlida the horse has major surgery, a cute but feisty badger needs help after being hit by a car, and will it get prickly when the junior vets release Timbuktu the hedgehog back into the wild?(n)

programme.title: Prank You Very Much

programme.title: Stacked!

programme.desc: Want to find out which very underrated dinosaur you are? Then tune into this ep of Wizz Quiz.(n)

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Summer tries to get a job at her favourite store in the mall to earn money for a new phone, but the job is offered to Tomika instead.(n)

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding. They must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan.(n)

programme.title: Nella the Princess Knight

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.sub-title: S02E34 Lucy's Elf and Fairy Party

programme.title: Daniel Tiger's Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Daniel and his friends learn more about their favourite neighbourhood trolley.(n)

programme.title: Bananas in Pyjamas

programme.title: Play School

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Each team gets a list of shapes and they have to look closely around the street to find them. When both teams have difficulty finding shapes on their list, Julia helps by finding shapes in places no one else thought of.(n)

programme.title: Emma!
programme.sub-title: S02E10 Huff and Puff Your Balloon!
programme.desc: Let's take a trip to Emma's bowtiful garden and meet some balletic butterflies. Butterflies flit from flower to flower, dancing in their happy way. Watching these beautiful, colourful creatures is how Emma spends her day.(n)

programme.title: Kazoops!
programme.desc: When Monty's friend fails to return a toy that he's borrowed, Monty decides to stop sharing his things, but begins to wonder whether one bad experience should make him change the way he is.(n)

programme.title: Molly and Mack
programme.desc: Molly promises to return a missing doll to its owner, but how can she find out where the owner lives? James helps out, and they make a surprise discovery.(n)

programme.title: Play School Story Time
programme.sub-title: David Walliams: The Bear Who Went Boo
programme.desc: Children's author and comedian David Walliams takes to the couch to read his very own story, The Bear Who Went Boo.(n)

programme.title: The Day Henry Met
programme.desc: Henry meets a cactus in a garden centre. Cactus' grandfather used to be a sheriff in the wild west and cactus has always dreamt of following in his footsteps.(n)

programme.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small
programme.desc: Grunty is having a grumpy day - which is not like Grunty at all. Miffy sets out to find out what's wrong with her friend - and what she can do to make her feel better.(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Sula is painting Biteysaurus on Bing's face, starting with Bitey's signature green. When she accidentally adds purple, Bing wants Sula to go home. Flop adds teeth to Bing so he can be Bitey.(n)

programme.title: Pocoyo
programme.desc: Pocoyo has a beautifully wrapped up present but he won't open it.(n)

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Barnabee and Dr Beetle help each other change their staid images during a series of fun fitness classes.(n)

programme.title: Five Minutes More
programme.desc: A little tree is worried when his leaves start to change colour, but with his friends' help, he discovers that he is just changing with the seasons.(n)

programme.title: Kiddets
programme.desc: Patches gets a fright from her own shadow, so the Kiddets work together to show her that shadows can be fun. Dapper writes a shadow play for all the Kiddets to perform.(n)

programme.title: Sally and Possum
programme.desc: Sally is boiling water in the kitchen to cook eggs for breakfast. Possum wakes up and is confused because there are no puddles from the rain he thought he heard last night.(n)

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Po makes lots of silly, funny sounds with the levers and buttons in Home Dome, and then the Tubby Phone rings for a silly Tubby Phone Dance. The Teletubbies enjoy watching children visit a farm and copying the sounds they hear.(n)

programme.title: In the Night Garden
programme.desc: The Tombliboos' trousers get mixed up all over the place in the Ninky Nonk, in the Pinky Ponk.(n)

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: The froglets are playing chase with Tiny on her scooter, but Small can't run fast enough to keep up. He makes his own space hopper but, unplanned, it hops him into orbit.(n)

programme.title: TwirlyWoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos watch some children untie balloons, which fly up high. Great BigHoo unties all the balloons and he, Toodloo, Chickedy and Chick fly up and up into the sky.(n)

programme.title: Baby Jake
programme.sub-title: S01E21 Baby Jake Loves to Roll and Ride
programme.desc: Baby Jake and Nibbles the rabbit go on a magical roller-coaster adventure in space.(n)

programme.title: Sarah and Duck
programme.desc: After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.(n)

programme.title: Rainbow Chicks
programme.desc: Berry loves drawing, and she wants to draw a beautiful picture, but she is annoyed because she is not sure which colour is the most beautiful colour.(n)

programme.title: The Furchester Hotel
programme.desc: After a goat checks in, the hotel strangely falls into disrepair. Turns out Mr Lawnmower is really hungry and is eating everything in sight. Meanwhile, Furgus's plant is growing quicker than he can trim it.(n)

programme.title: Pingu in the City
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking a new statue, Pingu uses paint to disguise himself as the statue replacement. No one notices his disguise, so he decides to have some fun by taking a doughnut.(n)

programme.title: Get Grubby TV
programme.desc: Garden gnomes aren't known for winning puddle jumping competitions. It takes a little help from dirtgirl and scrapboy to get Costa's attempt off the ground.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: It's Great Aunty's not-birthday and she's been given a whoopee cushion. Will she and Princess manage to get someone to sit on their naughty new toy?(n)

programme.title: Rita and Crocodile
programme.desc: Rita and Crocodile are going camping. It is cosy inside the tent on the mountain until it becomes dark. The moon casts shadows that look like witches and trolls on the canvas. Rita asks Crocodile to go out and scare them away.(n)

programme.title: Luo Bao Bei
programme.desc: LBB presumes that Faye wouldn't want to play with her and Timmy. Faye is understandably upset that her friends have made presumptions about her character.(n)

programme.title: Wildwoods
programme.desc: Cooper and Poppy have a race to decide which one of them is the fastest. Poppy struggles to keep up with powerful Cooper and decides to use some underhand techniques to give herself the edge. She learns that cheaters never win.(n)

programme.title: Arthur
programme.sub-title: S20E07 The Hallway Minotaur/Ladonna's Like List
programme.desc: There's a new sheriff, er, hallway monitor in town and his name is George Lundgren./ Ladonna Compson is friendly, funny and full of personality. Everyone likes her! At least that's what she thought.(n)

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: When there's nothing there to count and none is the amount, nobody does it better than Zero.(n)

programme.title: Play School
programme.desc: Join the fun as Michelle and Teo find an old suitcase full of bits and pieces, make woolly pom poms and dolly puppets, then pack for a holiday. Through the Windows we explore swell sculptures.(n)

programme.title: Bananas in Pyjamas
programme.desc: Rat buys a robot to help him in the shop but it's not long before Rat feels he's made a big mistake.(n)

programme.title: The Wiggles' World
programme.desc: Join Captain Feathersword and do the Captain's Wobbly Dance. James, the owner of Le James Cafe, has broccoli on the menu. Dance along to the Broccoli Bunch as we eat these delicious and healthy vegetables.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Norman and Mandy get Mike's van muddy, it looks like their day out to the lighthouse will be cancelled.(n)

programme.title: Dinosaur Train
programme.sub-title: Classic In The Jurassic: Ultimate Face-off
programme.desc: The 'wrestling' matchups from the three Time Periods are: T. Rex vs. Triceratops, Allosaurus vs. Stegosaurus and, Zupaysaurus vs. Riojasaurus.(n)

programme.title: Play School Nursery Rhyme News Time
programme.desc: Breaking news: Polly puts the kettle on, but Sukey takes it off again. Newsreader Kiruna gets to the bottom of the rhyme with Matt as Sammy?(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Scoop slides and gets stuck in the middle of the drained marina, he must work out a way to grip the slippery ground.(n)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: No one can agree on what to play, so they create Sausages - a two headed dog - who involves them all in a game of Simon Says, and everyone gets stuck in.(n)

programme.title: Noddy, Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Empty Store
programme.desc: Carlton is in charge of organising the Builders' Parade. But someone took all the supplies from the Brickabuild Store. Noddy investigates to find out who is behind this so that they can get everything ready.(n)

programme.title: Dot.
programme.desc: Dot is excited to participate in the community art show, but begins to feel bad when a comment she made on the internet is interpreted negatively by a new friend.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle has got another task for the children: making masks.(n)

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: S01E18 The Octonauts and the Snapping Shrimp
programme.desc: The Octonauts encounter a Snapping Shrimp, a small creature that uses its claws to make a big (and stunning) noise.(n)

programme.title: School of Roars
programme.desc: The teachers dig up a time capsule and ask the class to add their own memories to it. Poor Wufflebump can't think of anything special to put into the capsule; can his friends help him out?(n)

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When dad shows the kids how to use their old baby-harness, a new game is born: Dad Baby! But dad is unprepared for the harsh realities of giving birth to a baby Bingo.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: S02E47 The Tale of the Spilled Milk
programme.desc: When Peter, Lily and Benjamin accidentally spill Mittens' milk, they launch a daring mission to replace it.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The arrival of the Delivery Stork brings letters from the Squirrels' Pen Pals: children in other countries all over the world that the Squirrels have been writing to!(n)

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Frankie Fritz uses a handful of homemade drones to swipe Rusty and Ruby's mega battery.(n)

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.sub-title: S01E30 Andy And The Ethiopian Wolves
programme.desc: Photos that Mr Hammond took of a family of Ethiopian wolves are mysteriously blank. Andy heads to Africa in search of the wolf pack in order to take some new photos.(n)

programme.title: Dino Dana
programme.desc: Dana is too busy doing a dino experiment about how Edmontosaurus take care of their babies to take care of Nixon, but observing how the herd takes care of their baby provides Dana with some insights about her own family.(n)

programme.title: Spicks and Specks
programme.sub-title: Lee Kernaghan, Rusty Bertha, Fiona Campbell & Greg Fleet
programme.desc: Joining Adam, Alan and Myf are country music star Lee Kernaghan, scared weird little guy Rusty Bertha, mezzo soprano Fiona Campbell, and comedian Greg Fleet. Deborah Kayder and Nick Tsiavos close the show.(n)

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Joining Lee Mack and David Mitchell are comedian Rhod Gilbert, singer Ronan Keating, comedian Ellie Taylor, and reality TV star Georgia Toffolo.(n)

programme.title: Penn and Teller: Fool Us
programme.desc: Psychology student and amateur mentalist Emily Victoria, sentimental German magician Patrick Folkerts, card illusionist Migz, and edgy escape artist Seth Grabel try to fool P&T. Plus, Kim Raver pulls an egg from their sack.(n)

programme.title: Michael McIntyre's Comedy Roadshow
programme.desc: The series concludes with a trip to the Leeds Grand Theatre, where Michael introduces sets from Jack Whitehall, Andi Osho and Sean Collins. The ever-popular Ardal O'Hanlon closes the show.(n)

programme.title: Adam Hills: The Last Leg
programme.desc: After a tough week as coronavirus locks down the UK, Adam, Josh and Alex bring you an uplifting diversion joined by Lorraine Kelly and Tom Allen in a socially distant studio without an audience.(n)

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.sub-title: S03E07 Ronni Ancona, Chris Hoy, Gabby Logan, Danny Wallace
programme.desc: Chris Hoy, Ronni Ancona, Danny Wallace and Gabby Logan join team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible lies about themselves.(n)

programme.title: GameFace
programme.desc: Marcella is feeling left behind. Her friends have investments, her ex is moving in with her brother, and she only ever gets cast in 'gritty' roles. But she gets news of an audition. Will this be her big break?(n)

programme.title: The Games
programme.desc: John is upset with some negative publicity and comes up with an ingenious plan to stop it. The construction of the lacrosse centre is not running to schedule. A new drug testing regime is going to be introduced.(n)

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Alison, still recovering from her near-fatal accident, finds herself hounded by the ghostly gaggle, who now realise that she can both see and hear them.(n)

programme.title: Ill Behaviour
programme.desc: Joel fails to persuade Charlie to take chemotherapy. Refusing to give up, he decides to rent a remote country house, buy black market chemotherapy drugs, enlisting the help of Tess to kidnap Charlie and administer the chemo.(n)

programme.title: Alan Davies: As Yet Untitled
programme.sub-title: S01E04 Until I'm Married Or You're Dead
programme.desc: Alan Davies is joined by guests Bill Bailey, Kevin Eldon, Isy Suttie and Craig Campbell. Discussion topics include drunken pirates, kazoos, and the head of the Iraqi police.(n)

programme.title: Idiotsitter
programme.desc: The mansion is being fumigated, and Billie and Gene have a sleepover that quickly turns raucous.(n)

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The latest headlines updating you on the day's top stories from across Australia and around the world.(n)

programme.title: Station Close
programme.desc: Programs resume at 7.30pm, offering an unrivalled mix of scripted and non-scripted comedy and entertainment shows every night.(n)

programme.title: Station Close
programme.desc: Programs resume at 5am.(n)

programme.title: PML Later

programme.title: Drive Thru History
programme.desc: Drive Thru History is a joy ride down the fast lane of times-gone-by led by the irreverent, but always relevant, Dave Stotts. Dave doesn't just talk about history; he lives it in fast, easy-to-digest road trips. With Dave as your guide, you'll definitely enjoy the ride. You might even learn a thing or two about history...but who wants to be lectured to? So it better be fun. The all new Holy Land Series speeds through the ancient world of the Bible, giving you a fast-paced encounter with the people, places, and events that have shaped our world and the Christian faith. From the Patriarchs of the Old Testament to the events in Jerusalem during the life of Christ, you will travel on a visually exciting journey through the land of the Bible. This drive gives delightful insight into the history and culture behind the stories of Scripture.(n)

programme.title: An Uncommon Grace
programme.desc: Following her tour of duty, army nurse Grace Conner (Jes Macallan) returns to her grandmother's (Kelly McGillis) farm in Ohio's Amish country, and answers a neighbour's call for medical assistance following a mysterious intrusion and shooting at his family's nearby farm. Soon, Grace, who is not Amish, and Levi Troyer (Sean Faris) develop a deep connection that is more than simply neighbourly, and must sort out their forbidden relationship while Grace follows clues that ultimately lead her to the killer.(n)

programme.title: My Why
programme.desc: Mywhy.tv is a project that is designed to bring the message of Jesus to the forefront of the pop culture conversation through the art of storytelling.(n)

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: Glorious Gospel Church has been meeting the needs of the community since 1990. With a vision for a church that is real, relatable, enjoyable, life-changing and uplifting, they are committed to providing church services that will enable you to experience church this way. Linked by mutual vision and values, which are based firmly in the Bible and what the Bible teaches, GGC's mandate is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ in a relatable and practical way.(n)

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of God's Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting God's truth in clear and practical applications.(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Master
programme.desc: The Way of the Master television program, airing in over 190 countries, offers a unique and fascinating twist on reality TV. Each half-hour program teaches Christians how to share their faith effectively and inoffensively and then demonstrates it through real-life witnessing encounters. See Ray Comfort and his team follow Jesus' example by going to the highways and byways, malls and movie theatres, college campuses and local coffeehouses, to share the gospel with people from all walks of life: teenagers, intellectuals, atheists, Muslims, Jews, cult members, backsliders, and the self-righteous. Each episode also provides practical biblical instruction as the team tackles the most common questions and objections of the Christian faith and addresses challenging arguments and difficult situations. In this entertaining and equipping show, not only will you learn how to speak with your unsaved family and friends, but you will be given powerful tools that will replace your fears with courage.(n)

programme.title: Maralee Dawn and Friends
programme.desc: Maralee Dawn & Friends is a refreshing Bible based children's series. Maralee loves introducing children to the life changing power of the gospel and to see them empowered by the Holy Spirit equipped to contend and triumph in every adversity.(n)

programme.title: RocKids TV
programme.desc: The RocKids TV universe is centred around an imaginary TV network that airs fun and fantastic shows that teach kids about Jesus and the Bible.(n)

programme.title: Two By 2
programme.desc: By watching Two By 2, young children can begin learning the wonderful stories and messages of the Bible before they start school, as well as continue to use it as a learning aid when they are at school. Two by 2 provides children with a fresh way of experiencing the love of God through the stories and messages of our faith.(n)

programme.title: Whirl
programme.desc: Whirl is a Bible-based cartoon series about the loveable, sometimes overly-enthusiastic kids of First Second Church. In each episode, the kids tackle a different theme that is central to Christian values. Everything from generosity and forgiveness to doubt and the trinity are explored over the course of the series. And while the issues dealt with in each episode are relatable, the solutions this kooky cast often find are a bit... unconventional. Whether the kids of First Second Church are searching for a hidden sanctum of the church's altar guild, or trying to outsmart robots bent on world domination, these characters will keep the whole family laughing and learning.(n)

programme.title: Bible Man
programme.sub-title: E12 Say Goodbye to the Grand Duchess of Greed Part 1
programme.desc: Miles Peterson had everything: Money, power, fame...Until he lost it. Then Miles finds the power of God and harnesses that power to become Bibleman.(n)

programme.title: Adventures Sea Kids
programme.desc: Freddy, David, Melissa and their friends find themselves navigating the rough waters of peer pressure, temptation, fear, forgiving others, listening to parents, dealing with bullies, lack of self-esteem, and so much more. Children can relate to these adorable characters and their problematic situations. Each action-packed, beautifully animated episode, shows the characters praying to Jesus, asking Him for guidance and wisdom. The Sea Kids will help transform the heart and mind of every child as they learn how to tangibly live out the biblical principles being taught while building a strong foundation in Jesus.(n)

programme.title: Holy Moly
programme.desc: Holy Moly turns the Bible into a living, breathing colouring book that will delight children of all ages. Eyes will be fixed on the screen, observing how God is at work in the story when colour is introduced to an otherwise black-and-white world. Rather than dialogue, the series focuses on the Biblical characters' actions and emotions to help audiences of any language or background immediately relate to and remember these enriching stories.(n)

programme.title: Tune Time
programme.desc: Kids don't just watch TuneTime, they get involved. They will dance, they will sing, they will laugh, they'll yell out key words and phrases to help solve problems and all the while they'll discover the love of God.(n)

programme.title: Connect
programme.desc: Connect follows a plucky school theatre group that aspires to stage every book of the Bible. The kids are pretty sure they have a clear understanding of everything that happens in 'God's Big Story'. Well...most of it. They do have a few questions, concerns, and outright misconceptions. Fortunately, an ever-expanding cast of surprising and often bizarre visitors is on hand to help them navigate their journey through the scriptures. And yes, there is a talking sock.(n)

programme.title: Torchlighters: Heroes of the Faith
programme.desc: The fiery monk whose 95 Theses sparked the Reformation. In a world ruled by the church, all it took was one little nail, one well-written scroll, and one sharp-tongued monk to turn everything upside-down! Martin Luther didn't mean to spark the Reformation with his 95 Theses, but his realisation that salvation comes through faith and not works ignited the revolution that changed the world.(n)

programme.title: What's in the Bible?
programme.desc: What's in the Bible? How is it put together? What does it teach us? Join VeggieTales creator Phil Vischer and a bunch of hilarious new friends on a journey through the world's most important book, the Bible! This new series will have the whole family laughing and learning their way through God's Word.(n)

programme.title: Friends and Heroes
programme.desc: Friends and Heroes is an animated children's adventure based in Ancient Egypt, Israel and Rome. The story follows two young friends Macky and Portia as they fight for justice against the Roman Empire.(n)

programme.title: Joan of Arcadia
programme.desc: Millions of people speak to God. What if God spoke back? No one would ever believe Joan Girardi if she told them that God is talking to her. Does Joan have a higher purpose on earth, or are these strange conversations just in her head?(n)

programme.title: The Find: India
programme.desc: A young couple and their two children embark on a worldwide search for compelling stories, risk-taking individuals, and life-changing projects. In Season One, The Hansows travel to India to spend time with The Murrays, an incredible family changing their community.(n)

programme.title: At the Table
programme.desc: Real women, real conversations, real issues. It's where you'll find information on family, health and spirituality, but most of all, a community doing motherhood together.(n)

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed they are by their heavenly Father.(n)

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Distant Shores is a sailing series about the cruising life, with lots of tips for sailors planning to sail away plus destination information to help you make your cruising plans. Distant Shores has been filming for nearly 15 years, and hosts Paul and Sheryl know the fun and challenges of the cruising life. There include plenty of cruising tips in this travel series as well as lifestyle segments and hints for sailors heading to exotic destinations. Destinations include the ICW trip south on the US east coast, the Bahamas, Caribbean, Mediterranean, Scandinavia, transatlantic passage making, the French Canals and more.(n)

programme.title: Drive Thru History
programme.desc: Drive Thru History is a joy ride down the fast lane of times-gone-by led by the irreverent, but always relevant, Dave Stotts. Dave doesn't just talk about history; he lives it in fast, easy-to-digest road trips. With Dave as your guide, you'll definitely enjoy the ride. You might even learn a thing or two about history...but who wants to be lectured to? So it better be fun. The all new Holy Land Series speeds through the ancient world of the Bible, giving you a fast-paced encounter with the people, places, and events that have shaped our world and the Christian faith. From the Patriarchs of the Old Testament to the events in Jerusalem during the life of Christ, you will travel on a visually exciting journey through the land of the Bible. This drive gives delightful insight into the history and culture behind the stories of Scripture.(n)

programme.title: An Uncommon Grace
programme.desc: Following her tour of duty, army nurse Grace Conner (Jes Macallan) returns to her grandmother's (Kelly McGillis) farm in Ohio's Amish country, and answers a neighbour's call for medical assistance following a mysterious intrusion and shooting at his family's nearby farm. Soon, Grace, who is not Amish, and Levi Troyer (Sean Faris) develop a deep connection that is more than simply neighbourly, and must sort out their forbidden relationship while Grace follows clues that ultimately lead her to the killer.(n)

programme.title: My Why
programme.desc: Mywhy.tv is a project that is designed to bring the message of Jesus to the forefront of the pop culture conversation through the art of storytelling.(n)

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
programme.desc: The postal detectives are put to the test when they seem to be unable to deliver a damaged letter from a military veteran that's a matter of life and death. Oliver and his father Joe embark on a father-son bonding adventure that ends up putting both their lives at risk.(n)

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schuller's grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherd's Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.(n)

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA, join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!(n)

programme.title: Give Me An Answer
programme.desc: Give Me an Answer exists to answer life's most difficult questions. The shows are recorded on college campus across the United States where Cliffe Knechtle engages with skeptical students and professors, to give real answers to the tough questions about Christianity.(n)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: In the supercharged world of dirt track racing, a single mistake causes the lives of two men to change forever. One must fight for his family, the other must fight to forgive.(n)

programme.title: For the Lost
programme.desc: For The Lost is a unique documentary series that follows one of a kind missionary band 'No Longer Music' on their tour through much of Europe and the Middle east. No Longer Music utilises music, art, and theatre to portray a modern day Jesus story to global youth culture located outside the church. This four-part series shares the band's intense five-month journey, including the highs and lows, and the incredible life transformations that took place along the summer tour of 2014.(n)

programme.title: Acts of God: Series
programme.desc: If God is good, why does he allow so much pain in the world? Acts of God lays this subject bare as seven hurting souls are brought together through the tragic death of a child. Acts of God offers insight and hope as it explores how, in the face of personal pain or the suffering of those we love, we can trust in the Lord at all times.(n)

programme.title: Brian Houston @ Hillsong TV
programme.desc: Brian Houston at Hillsong TV is a half-hour Christian television program featuring his teaching from the Hillsong Church services in Sydney, Australia. Pastor Brian's messages are empowering, passionate and practical for everyday life.(n)

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of God's Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting God's truth in clear and practical applications.(n)

programme.title: A Life of Victory
programme.desc: Former tennis great Margaret Court is now as passionate about God and His love for people as she was about winning tennis. 'A Life of Victory with Margaret Court' includes empowering teaching, and uplifting contenporary Gospel music performed by the Victory Life worship team.(n)

programme.title: TV4DADs
programme.desc: The team from TV4DADS returns with an all new man camp, this time in Michigan. This popular teaching program uncovers keys to successful parenting with special emphasis on the noble calling of Fatherhood. It captures the highs and lows of this diverse group of fathers, mentors and sons as they spend ten days together in Michigan at Man Camp. With music by Chris Molitor and special messages from Malachi ministry teachers, Brian Molitor, Brian Pruitt and Ron Ives, the Dads and sons spend time in prayer, participate in campfire discussions and enjoy a diverse range of activities such as archery, horse-riding, fishing, zip-lining and canoeing.(n)

programme.title: My Why
programme.desc: Mywhy.tv is a project that is designed to bring the message of Jesus to the forefront of the pop culture conversation through the art of storytelling.(n)

programme.title: For the Lost
programme.desc: For The Lost is a unique documentary series that follows one of a kind missionary band 'No Longer Music' on their tour through much of Europe and the Middle east. No Longer Music utilises music, art, and theatre to portray a modern day Jesus story to global youth culture located outside the church. This four-part series shares the band's intense five-month journey, including the highs and lows, and the incredible life transformations that took place along the summer tour of 2014.(n)

programme.title: Acts of God: Series
programme.desc: If God is good, why does he allow so much pain in the world? Acts of God lays this subject bare as seven hurting souls are brought together through the tragic death of a child. Acts of God offers insight and hope as it explores how, in the face of personal pain or the suffering of those we love, we can trust in the Lord at all times.(n)

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: The best-known Christian evangelist of the 20th century, Billy Graham gained world attention in 1949 with a tent revival in downtown Los Angeles that was scheduled for three weeks and lasted six. In the ensuing 55 years and more, 'Billy Graham Crusades' consistently drew audiences of thousands to arenas and stadiums throughout the world.'Classic Crusades' presents the best of the last 35 years of Billy Graham that brought the message of salvation through Jesus Christ to the world. World renowned actors, singers, athletes and ministers share the platform with Dr. Graham. Also often features the famous sounds of the Billy Graham Choir, George Beverly Shea and Cliff Barrows for an hour of blessing and inspiration to all who watch.(n)

programme.title: She Has a Name
programme.desc: Jason, an American lawyer, poses as a john to build a legal case against a pimp trafficking girls to Bangkok. Can he win the trust of a young prostitute known only as Number 18?(n)

programme.title: Holy Rollin'
programme.desc: Nick and Yvette Wynne take on the gruelling journey of riding around Australia on their matching 1200 Ducati motorbikes. Get a feel for the rugged sunburnt countryside and the people of the outback as these two motorcycle missionaries traverse 20 000 km in 3 months over 12 episodes.(n)

programme.title: Impact for Life
programme.desc: An inspirational program with principles for living, and life stories from everyday New Zealanders. Collated with a fresh and dynamic edge, Pastors Peter and Bev Mortlock share principles both from the platform, and on location. Impact for Life equips people to mature and grow into Christ-likeness while maximising their potential.(n)

programme.title: Praise, Prayer and Preaching
programme.desc: Recorded live at Wesley Mission, Sydney, Australia. Rev Keith Garner, an inspiring and gifted teacher who not only wants to influence the world, but to change the world, encourages and challenges us every week to live out our faith in a practical way.(n)

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: Glorious Gospel Church has been meeting the needs of the community since 1990. With a vision for a church that is real, relatable, enjoyable, life-changing and uplifting, they are committed to providing church services that will enable you to experience church this way. Linked by mutual vision and values, which are based firmly in the Bible and what the Bible teaches, GGC's mandate is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ in a relatable and practical way.(n)

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of God's Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting God's truth in clear and practical applications.(n)

programme.title: Wesley Impact
programme.desc: Hosted by Rev Keith Garner, this series looks at the work of Wesley Mission at the grass roots with personal good-news stories shared by clients and staff within the various support services and programs they provide which are helping people get their lives back on track. Episodes also include featured guests from Australia and around the world, sharing their personal and inspirational stories of tackling life's challenges to emerge with a message of hope, victory and courage. Featuring an in-house band, led by Music Director Craig Gower, showcasing some of Australia's leading Christian artists.(n)

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: E13 3 Conversations That Can Change Your Life
programme.desc: Bayless Conley is a church leader and speaker, known for both his clear presentation of the Bible message and the way he applies it to everyday life. Bayless grew up in Southern California where, during his teenage years, he became involved in a lifestyle of drug and alcohol abuse. After years of searching for truth, and a number of near-death experiences, he found answers and freedom in Jesus when a 12-year-old boy shared God's message of hope with him in a park one day. Bayless' unique background and remarkable story have enabled him to reach a diverse audience globally. Today, the Answers with Bayless Conley broadcast is impacting lives around the world in numerous languages. Bayless is the founding and senior pastor of Cottonwood Church in Orange County, California. He and his wife, Janet, are the parents of three grown children, and enthusiastic grandparents. Together they passionately pursue life, God, and family. In Answers with Bayless Conley, Bayless offers clear and practical Bible teaching that helps viewers find answers for their life. His passion is to see the truth of God's Word set people free.(n)

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: E13 Victory Over Fear- When Faith Gives Way To Fear
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.(n)

programme.title: PowerPoint with Dr. Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.(n)

programme.title: Brian Houston @ Hillsong TV
programme.sub-title: E13 Understanding The Realms of Dreams and Visions Pt1
programme.desc: Brian Houston at Hillsong TV is a half-hour Christian television program featuring his teaching from the Hillsong Church services in Sydney, Australia. Pastor Brian's messages are empowering, passionate and practical for everyday life.(n)

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA, join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!(n)

programme.title: The Blessed Life with Robert Morris
programme.desc: Gateway Church is a multicampus, nondenominational church in the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex led by Pastor Robert Morris. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 39,000 active members and six local campuses. Its vision is to see people saved, healed, set free, discipled, equipped, empowered, and serving. Its mission is to help each person at Gateway believe in Jesus, belong to family, become a follower, and build God's kingdom.(n)

programme.title: Covid19 Call to Prayer
programme.desc: Every night 1900hrs, wherever you are, join Christians across the nation in praying for Australia in this time of Covid19. Pastor Wayne Alcorn will present inspirational weekly devotionals.(n)

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in God's Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry. Hear inspiration for change, healing, peace and joy through his affective communication connecting you to God, the church, and the world!(n)

programme.title: Joyce Meyer Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.sub-title: E59 How to Have Successful Relationships
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the world's leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.(n)

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: Elizabeth, Carson and Faith deal with an outbreak of chickenpox. Faith's dedication to her job jeopardizes her position at medical school. Rosemary falls seriously ill while Lee and Elizabeth stay by her side. When Gowen Petroleum is sued, Bill must pull together Hope Valley's first jury, while Nathan investigates. Lucas questions Gowen's business practices.(n)

programme.title: I Can Only Imagine
programme.desc: What can you only imagine? Has something or someone left you feeling rejected, guilty, or broken? Before he became the lead singer of MercyMe, Bart Millard suffered a painful childhood. Abused by his father, Bart built walls around his heart. In the I Can Only Imagine Series, Bart shares his own personal story with you. He watched a monster become a godly man. He came face to face with his own brokenness, and he saw God transform a lifetime of hurt into a beautiful and enduring purpose.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Up Bates
programme.sub-title: E13 A Big Bates Thanksgiving Pt2
programme.desc: Get ready to give thanks, Bates style. The whole family heads to Gil's parents' farm for a super-sized family dinner. The family joins hands to say what they're thankful for. Someone reveals a surprise.(n)

programme.title: Joan of Arcadia
programme.desc: Millions of people speak to God. What if God spoke back? No one would ever believe Joan Girardi if she told them that God is talking to her. Does Joan have a higher purpose on earth, or are these strange conversations just in her head?(n)

programme.title: The Bulloch Family Ranch
programme.desc: Meet Julie and Rusty Bulloch, a fun-loving, working class couple that devotes their time and resources to help others. Julie and Rusty are the proud parents of 25 kids they have taken in to save from the streets and broken families, providing them with a home and love that helps them to flourish. This series follows the lives of the Bullochs starting with the arrival of two new troubled youths - football players Davin and Jordan. Usually Rusty and Julie identify the kids they want to help, but in Davin's case, a social worker asked the family to help him following some incidents with the law. In Jordan's case, it was biological-son, Brodie, who initiated inviting in Jordan because he saw that the teen was teetering on the brink. Julie and Rusty decided to follow their hearts and open their home once again.(n)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: In the supercharged world of dirt track racing, a single mistake causes the lives of two men to change forever. One must fight for his family, the other must fight to forgive.(n)

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed they are by their heavenly Father.(n)

programme.title: The Catholic Guy
programme.sub-title: E135 Trust Your Way to a Better Future
programme.desc: Bruce Downes is The Catholic Guy. Bruce and his team will move, inspire and challenge you to live your life to the absolute fullest. No matter your age, situation or background, be prepared to laugh, learn and listen to what God is trying to say to you. Bruce travels Australia speaking regularly about his experiences in life and in the Church in a way that is both relatable and easy to understand. Bruce's message of power, impact, freedom and purpose is for anyone and everyone - for no matter where you are around the world today, God is never far from you.(n)

programme.title: Precious Memories
programme.desc: Join Bill and Gloria Gaither and their special guests for a great singalong of old time gospel music. Relax, as they journey back to a time when things were simple and lifetime memories were made. Howard and Vestal Goodman, James and Jimmy Blackwood, The Nelons, The Talleys, and other renowned Christian recording artists join Bill and Gloria in these nostalgia-filled video journeys.(n)

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: Join us for a musical celebration of life and faith as Songs of Praise travels throughout Britain and the world presenting soul stirring hymns and touching stories of inspiration.(n)

programme.title: Amish Grace
programme.desc: The inspirational true story of forgiveness. The peaceful Amish community of Nickel Mines is forever changed when a gunman senselessly takes the lives of five girls in a schoolhouse shooting before taking his own life. What transpires afterward takes the community by storm, as the media descend on the town and criticize its Amish leaders for their notion of unconditional forgiveness of the shooter and their outreach of support to his widow, Amy Roberts (Tammy Blanchard, Bella). Kimberly Williams-Paisley (TV's According to Jim and Father of the Bride 1 & 2), as mother of one of the five girls, leads a talented cast in the highest-rated original film ever to appear on the Lifetime Movie Network. Devastated by her daughter's death, Ida (Kimberly Williams-Paisley) finds herself struggling with her community's belief in the transcending power of forgiveness and faces a profound test of her faith. As she begins to feel like an outsider within her own community, Ida must decide whether or not to stay with the Amish - and her beloved husband (Matt Letscher). Delicately crafted and featuring poignant performances, this film, based on a true story, is a moving testament to the power of forgiveness.(n)

programme.title: Jesus the Game Changer
programme.desc: The sequel to the award-winning documentary Jesus the Game Changer is a 13 episode series, hosted by Karl Faase. Why did followers of Jesus take this message and risk danger and death to ensure people heard the Gospel? Follow along as Karl speaks to over 50 guests around the world about how and why the gospel spread to become a truly global faith. Be inspired by stories of faith and courage of those who went to the ends of the earth, and consider what it looks like now to take the gospel from everywhere, to everywhere.(n)

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.(n)

programme.title: Life with Paul De Jong
programme.desc: We like to call it 'soul food'. This program uses creative illustration, real life stories and biblical teaching to encourage and help viewers discover a greater purpose to their lives.(n)

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: E13 3 Conversations That Can Change Your Life
